metadata.name: call_swf_4
metadata.description: Tests CALL opcode (0x9E) - calls frame actions by frame number
missing_features: Frame labels not supported (would require SWFRecomp to generate label->frame mapping)
Multi-MovieClip support not implemented (only main timeline supported)
Test coverage: need multi-frame test to verify actual frame execution

notes: ActionCall now actually executes frame actions (not just logging)
Frame number calling works with global frame_funcs array
quit_swf state is properly saved/restored to prevent premature termination
CALL is a legacy opcode from SWF 4; modern ActionScript uses CALL_FUNCTION instead
